flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Locate, read, and study both old and new books and articles on steam power.
guide.introduction_rendered: Locate, read, and study both old and new books and articles on steam power.
guide.summary: After 80+ hours, I'm almost done with this engine.  I designed it, drew up plans, ordered raw materials, and machined all the parts myself.  You can, too.
guide.title: Oscilating cylinder steam engine from scratch
